Name: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk Day In Life
About the game: You play as Ikuro, a gambling addict looking to fuel his other addiction to his personalized A.I robot wife, Sei. There's a problem though. Sei needs memory components, but of course, getting the money for that is easier said then done, so expect to encounter some shady and unsavory individuals on your way... Relaxing, Immersive OST! Gorgeous, animated backgrounds and sprites! Gripping, dark narrative! Colorful and well written characters!
